SponsorsPage.title: Sponsors
SponsorsPage.body1: We are actively looking for sponsors! If you are interested in working with us, or recruiting from the world's top talent in problem solving, analysis, AI and more, feel free to reach out to us at sponsorship@lux-ai.org

Home.subtitle: A novel approach to AI Programming Challenges.
Home.title: Welcome To Lux.

sec1.title: What is the Lux AI Challenge?
sec1.body1: Lux is an AI programming game competition.
sec1.body2: Teams are given the Lux design specification. Starting off with a very basic strategy, teams will improve and upload new submissions to the competition and compete directly against other competitors to climb the leaderboard.
sec1.body3: Generally, the competition involves a multi-variable optimization and resource gathering and allocation problem in a 1v1 scenario against competitor bots. Successful submissions will not only involve solving this optimization, but also responding to the opposite team and coming out on top.
sec1.body4: You and your team will have to make improvements to unit navigation, resource gathering, macro and micro strategies and more to incrementally increase the power of your bot. See the other competitions for examples:
sec1.body5: We are focused on user-centered, inclusive, and engaging designs that work to bring wide ranging complexity but maintain accessibility for our competitors. We're dedicated to crafting competitions that require creativity and out-of-the-box thinking.

details.title: Competition Details
details.body1: Lux AI Season 1 has started! It runs from August 16 to December 6th
details.body3: We will run a ranked leaderboard. Your submission will compete against similarly ranked submissions to determine new rankings
details.body5: Python, Javascript, C++, Java will be officially supported. More are TBD. PRs are welcomed for other languages!
details.body6: Anyone is eligible to compete! As long as you submit code you will be considered a participant!

tournament-schedule.title: Tournament Schedule
tournament-schedule.body1: The main tournament will run throughout the competition for about 3 months. At the conclusion of this, we will use the rankings on the leaderboard as the final rankings and give out awards based on that.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body2: Join our Discord for up-to-date announcements, Q&A, and discussion, or email us at hello@lux-ai.org

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.body1: Sign up to be the first to hear about important announcements regarding Lux AI. We hope to see you there!

partner.title: Partnerships
partner.body1: We are happy to announce we are collaborating with Kaggle to Lux AI Season 1!

sponsor.title: Sponsors
sponsor.body1: Thank you to QuantCo, JVentures, and QAImera for sponsoring Season 1 of our competition! We are actively looking for sponsors for future competitions! If you are interested in working with us, or recruiting from the world's top talent in problem solving, analysis, AI and more, feel free to reach out to us at sponsorship@lux-ai.org
